alert.note: Alert for Northern Washington (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 9:18AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Washington County through 945 AM EDT... At 918 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fair Haven, or near Whitehall, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, half inch hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... Whitehall, Poultney Village, Hampton, Lock Twelve Marina, Hampton Flats, Low Hampton, Grays Corner, East Whitehall and Snody Dock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
